CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, first_name VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, login VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL UNIQUE, password VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL NOT NULL CHECK (balance >= 0), created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, deleted_at TIMESTAMPTZ, updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ );
ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN search tsvector GENERATED ALWAYS AS (to_tsvector('russian', replace( users.first_name || ' ' || users.last_name || ' ' || users.login, 'ั', 'ะต'))) STORED; CREATE INDEX users_search_index ON users USING GIN (search);
